entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MapShortCircuit causes runtime exceptions in app published as native AOT #47941
  • Add IdentityConstants.BearerAndApplicationScheme #47938
  • Replace BearerTokenOptions.ExtractBearerToken with Event #47937
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_* #47933
  • IDE0005 error when building with latest SDK #47932
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudDeleteProduct #47930
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, mvc #47929
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #47928
  • Exception thrown during Hot Reload #47926
  • Blazor WASM using 'en' culture instead of 'en-GB' when using Accept-Language header #47924
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_IndividualAuth_NoHttps_Works_WithOutLocalDB #47919
    .NET 8 Planning
  • RDG file name mismatch between SyntaxTree.FilePath and [CallerFilePath] causes runtime KeyNotFoundException #47918

Closed

  • Update TypedResults.Stream to include optional enableRangeProcessing parameter, or change documentation. #47557
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, single_query #47700
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47829
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, updates #47832
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes #47899
  • Add API endpoints for generating identity tokens #47227
    8.0-preview4
  • mvc F# template: conditions defined in the templates are not correct #44729
    Backlog
  • Redis as db #47773
  • Output cache middleware throws when changing AllowCacheStorage on a later stage AND when AllowLocking = true. #47253
  • dotnet application crash with segfault libcoreclr.so UBUNTU 22.04 #47636
  • Blazor: Apply Theme from Local Storage or User Storage will Meet Flicker #47746
  • Different Behavior during ASPNET Core upgrade (MSI install vs Windows Update install) #41377
    7.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Run quarantined-pr job on all release branches #47939
    area-infrastructure
  • Re-use base project for RDG tests #47936
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Remove unused variable #47931
    area-commandlinetools
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Add MapIdentityApi<TUser>() #47927
    Servicing-approved, area-identity
  • IExceptionHandler for exception handler middleware #46280 #47923
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update SDK #47540
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 8.0-preview5
  • Add MapIdentityApi<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity, 8.0-preview5
  • Add comment about SourceBuildPrebuilt versions #47935
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2168950 #47784
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Enable prebuilt detection #47894
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • [release/8.0-preview4] [blazor] Drop explicit change of extension of assembly to lazy load #47905
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • [release/8.0-preview4] Add suppression message to JSON serialization #47910
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix F# starter web template. #47697
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Quarantine BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_IndividualAuth_NoHttps_Works_With… #47920
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5
  • Fixes CI build failures after conflicting merge affecting RDG baselines. #47917
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview5
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr
  • Update servicing milestones for June #47765
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    blocked, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47807
    Servicing-consider, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix RequestBody logging when zero byte read is used #47811
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Guard ILogger calls that do work at call site #47837
    area-runtime
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • [release/6.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.2.3 -> 6.5.0) #47860
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.4.0 -> 6.5.0) #47861
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Fewer `System.Exception` #47873
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update version of Microsoft.Identity.Web and Microsoft.Identity.Web.UI to 2.7.0 #47906
    area-infrastructure, area-identity
